DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effects of K Tape on walking pattern, muscle activity and motor performance in children with and without developmental coordination disorder (DCD).
DOC.brief_title: Taping for Children With and Without Movement Clumsiness
DOC.criteria: Children with DCD and typically developing children will need to score <16 percentile and >25 percentile, respectively, on MABC2 Study in mainstream schools No intellectual disabilities Subjects who are receiving regular treatments Demonstrate excessive disruptive behaviour Unable to follow instructions Any diagnosis of neurological, musculoskeletal or cognitive disorder that affects test performance
